content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the command "browse_website" to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the National Geographic website. The command returned a list of articles, videos, podcasts, and other resources covering a wide range of topics. The website also offers links to newsletters and subscription options.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -la"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 388\\ndrwxrwxr-x 3 1000 rvm     151 Jun 10 23:10 .\\ndrwxrwxr-x 1 root root     40 Jun 10 23:40 ..\\ndrwxr-xr-x 3 root root     27 Jun 10 23:10 Atlas\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   1281 Jun 10 23:08 ai_code.py\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 380000 Jun 10 23:45 atlas.json\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm     912 Jun 10 18:26 atlas.settings.yaml\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm    1062 Jun 10 22:24 atlas.yaml\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    205 Jun 10 23:08 file_logger.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result')]
"""
